name: Magician's Restage
effectText: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon it. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Magician" Continuous Spell from your Deck to your hand, except "Magician's Restage".
